pages.page_overview_summary: This cover sheet provides an overview of the project, including the project name, location, and date. It includes a sheet list detailing the various plans and sections included in the set. The title block contains important project information and notes regarding the ownership and use of the drawings.

pages.page_overview_summary: The site plan illustrates the layout of the existing church and proposed changes, including the location of a new sewage tank and parking area. It shows setback distances from various site features and includes notes on compliance with local guidelines. The plan is drawn at a scale of 1" = 20'-0".
